Class UsersDAO

java.lang.Object
users.UsersDAO
public class UsersDAO extends Object
The UsersDAO class provides data access object methods for managing user records in the SQLite database. It supports operations such as adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting users, as well as authentication and role management. Users are stored in the `users` table, which includes columns for user ID, username, hashed password, role, and an optional associated customer ID.
Version:
5/1/2025
Author:
Amrit Singh

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public boolean addUser(Users user)
      Adds a new user to the database with a hashed password.
      Parameters:
      user - the Users object containing user details
      Returns:
      true if the user was added successfully, false otherwise

    • findAllUsers

      public ArrayList<Users> findAllUsers()
      Retrieves all user records from the database.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Users objects, or an empty list if no users are found

    • findUser

      public Users findUser(int userId)
      Retrieves a user record by their unique user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Users object if found, or null if not found

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser(int userId)
      Deletes a user record from the database by their user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion is successful, false otherwise

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(Users user)
      Updates an existing user record in the database with new details.
      Parameters:
      user - the Users object containing updated user details
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false otherwise

    • authenticate

      public boolean authenticate(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a user by their username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      password - the plaintext password to check
      Returns:
      true if authentication is successful, false otherwise

    • getUserRole

      public String getUserRole(String username)
      Retrieves the role of a user by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      the role of the user if found, or null if the user is not found

    • updateUserRole

      public boolean updateUserRole(int userId, String newRole)
      Updates the role of a user by their user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to update
      newRole - the new role to set for the user
      Returns:
      true if the role is updated successfully, false otherwise

    • isUsernameExist

      public boolean isUsernameExist(String username)
      Checks if a given username already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to check in the database.
      Returns:
      true if the username exists, false otherwise.
